message: Let's be reasonable, I'm giving you a fair share.
Let's split it more evenly, I'm willing to compromise.
I'll give you a bit more, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.
Come on, meet me in the middle, it's only fair.
I'll give you a tiny bit more, but I'm not going to meet you in the middle.
Seriously, just 1 dollar difference? Can't we just split it almost evenly?
You're getting desperate, I can tell. I'll give you a tiny bit more, but that's it.
Fine, 50/50. Can't get any more even than that.
